word:
Section Eight - Timely Counsels

                            "Behold, I come quickly: hold that 
                             fast which thou hast, that no man 
                             take thy crown." Revelation 3:11. 


               Faithful Stewardship [MANUSCRIPT 
                READ BEFORE THE DELEGATES AT THE 
                 SAN JOSE (CALIFORNIA) STATE 
                  CONFERENCE, JANUARY, 1907.] 


     Christ has purchased us by the price of His own blood. He has paid the purchase money for our redemption, and if we will lay hold upon the treasure, it is ours by the free gift of God.
